resources.string:
This project is based on GPS sensor based map .on their showing their position to his/her friends , relatives , parents ,or boss user can securely control their position to their relatives.it also provide distance between two user . 
 
 if they want to reach their destination by walking , bus etc . show how many time to reach to their station. All user has a profile set up on with verification.it will help known their position to there relatives. Some time we say wrong position in mobile call it will solve this problem also. 
 
 And last one is Owner of a factory he want know his goods goes which direction it is stop or running these information can easily access able in this section. It will also helpful for blind people..
